body_html:
hi @benwu232
Thanks for your feedback.

We just added cloudfront caching to our pip wheel downloads, so that a mirror in China will be able to download it fast and we serve them via https://download.pytorch.org

You can find the new pip download URLs on our website: http://pytorch.org/

body:
hi @benwu232 
Thanks for your feedback.

We just added cloudfront caching to our pip wheel downloads, so that a mirror in China will be able to download it fast and we serve them via https://download.pytorch.org

You can find the new pip download URLs on our website: http://pytorch.org/
